resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156483</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156483</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2786</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Leave me a note -student activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie mir eine Anmerkung - 
Kursteilnehmeraktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Laissez-moi une note - activité d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixe-me uma nota - atividade do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lascimi una nota - attività dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μου αφήστε μια σημείωση - δραστηριότητα σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Déjeme una nota - actividad del estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A fun student assignment for assesment where Pupils are asked to reassemble a note that was torn and practise sequence of events.Students learn to write their own notes too.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Spaßkursteilnehmeranweisung für assesment, 
in dem Pupillen gebeten werden, eine Anmerkung neu zusammenzustellen, 
die heftig gezerrissen und Reihenfolge von events.Students übt wurde,
erlernen, ihre eigenen Anmerkungen auch zu schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant d'amusement pour 
l'assesment où des pupilles sont invitées à rassembler une note qui
a été déchirée et pratique l'ordre d'events.Students apprennent à
écrire leurs propres notes aussi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante do divertimento para
o assesment onde as pupilas são pedidas para remontar uma nota que 
seja rasgada e pratique a seqüência de events.Students aprende 
escrever demasiado suas próprias notas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo di divertimento per 
il assesment dove le pupille sono chieste di riunire una nota che è 
stata strappata e si esercita nella sequenza di events.Students impara
scrivere le loro proprie note anche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών διασκέδασης για το assesment 
όπου οι μαθητές καλούνται να συγκεντρώσουν εκ νέου μια σημείωση 
που ήταν σχισμένη και οι σπουδαστές ακολουθίας πρακτικής 
γεγονότων μαθαίνουν να γράφουν τις σημειώσεις τους επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante de la diversión 
para el assesment donde las pupilas se piden volver a montar una nota 
que fue rasgada y practique la secuencia de events.Students aprende 
escribir sus propias notas también.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
